long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Night Atlas Lite - Custom Themes for Daymap

*It's Version 1.9.5 not 20.6

Elevate your Daymap experience with Night Atlas Lite, a sleek and lightweight Chrome extension designed to customize the look and feel of your Daymap interface. Whether you're a student or teacher, Night Atlas Lite allows you to personalize Daymap to match your style, improve readability, or reduce eye strain during long study sessions.

Key Features:
Daymap-Exclusive Themes: Select from a variety of beautifully crafted themes tailored specifically for Daymap’s interface.

Custom Color Picker: Personalize your Daymap with your own custom colors, adjusting primary, secondary, tertiary, and accent tones to suit your preferences.

Responsive Design: Themes are built to work seamlessly across different sections of Daymap, ensuring a consistent and polished experience.
Special Theme 7 Feature: Enjoy a unique visual touch with an optional corner image that appears only when you select Theme 7, adding a bit of flair to your interface.

Whether you prefer cool tones, vibrant colors, or minimalistic dark themes, Night Atlas Lite brings full customization to your Daymap account. Simplify your online experience and make Daymap your own!
